ygData.subject: Benchmark Ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, in my diploma thesis I m trying to benchmark a few neural evolution approaches. So far i came up with a few, I d say less complex problems for testing.

Hi all,

in my diploma thesis I'm trying to benchmark a few neural evolutio=
n
approaches. So far i came up with a few, I'd say less complex problems
fo=
r testing. 
So far I got the following:
- XOR, (a xor b) and (c xor d)
- Po=
le Balancing
- Obstacle Navigator
- Khepera Robot Simulator
- two spiral cl=
assification
- mathematical function approximation

Does anyone have some m=
ore complex problems which can be evaluated in
bearable time on a dual core=
, maybe something involving ODE.

Robin
